sources.title: Milk for Baby (1938)
sources.description: A crying baby won't drink it's milk until Edna May Oliver tells him a story about W. C. Fields trying to milk a cow. An uninspired outing seemingly taking the caricatures from the end-of-the-line Van Buren cartoon, "Dan Cupid Gets His Man". Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/milk-for-baby-1938/

metadata.Plot: A crying baby won't drink it's milk until Edna May Oliver tells him a story about W. C. Fields trying to milk a cow. An uninspired outing seemingly taking the caricatures from the end-of-the-line Van Buren cartoon, "Dan Cupid Gets His Man".
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Donald McKee, Tom Morrison
